product.title: Yeeaulpa 12 Pcs Hair Roller Clips Set，Curling Clips for Hot Rollers and Curlers
product.title_excluding_brand: 12 Pcs Hair Roller Clips Set，Curling Clips for Hot Rollers and Curlers
product.description: 【Wide Use】 These hair roller clips can not only be used to hold rollers and curlers when curling hair, but also can be used to section hair and fix hair when washing face, bathing and make-up. They are great for hair styling at home and at the salon or for daily hair fixing.
product.description_html: 【Wide Use】 These hair roller clips can not only be used to hold rollers and curlers when curling hair, but also can be used to section hair and fix hair when washing face, bathing and make-up. They are great for hair styling at home and at the salon or for daily hair fixing.
product.description_full:
【Wide Use】 These hair roller clips can not only be used to hold rollers and curlers when curling hair, but also can be used to section hair and fix hair when washing face, bathing and make-up. They are great for hair styling at home and at the salon or for daily hair fixing. * 【Practical Design】 The claws on both sides of our hot roller clips are designed in different lengths. The long side can reach into the hair well to hold the rollers and curlers firmly. The short side is to make it easy to open the curl clips when removing without pulling your hair. The claws of this hot roller clips are very dense and can go through the hair well without leaving marks, providing you with a good using experience.
 * 【Heat Resistant】 The hair curler clips are made of heat-resistant plastic, lightweight, can be used with both hot and cold rollers, won't hurt your hair, stress-free to wear, so you can easily have a beautiful hairstyle.
 * 【Suitable Size】 Our curl clips are 6cm/2.36in long and 5cm/1.97in wide. The springs at the closure of the hot curler clips are strong and durable, can maintain high elasticity even after repeated use. The roller clips can hold most hair rollers and heated curlers up to 60mm , meet your different curling needs.
product.description_full_html:
【Wide Use】 These hair roller clips can not only be used to hold rollers and curlers when curling hair, but also can be used to section hair and fix hair when washing face, bathing and make-up. They are great for hair styling at home and at the salon or for daily hair fixing.
  • 【Practical Design】 The claws on both sides of our hot roller clips are designed in different lengths. The long side can reach into the hair well to hold the rollers and curlers firmly. The short side is to make it easy to open the curl clips when removing without pulling your hair. The claws of this hot roller clips are very dense and can go through the hair well without leaving marks, providing you with a good using experience.
  • 【Heat Resistant】 The hair curler clips are made of heat-resistant plastic, lightweight, can be used with both hot and cold rollers, won't hurt your hair, stress-free to wear, so you can easily have a beautiful hairstyle.
  • 【Suitable Size】 Our curl clips are 6cm/2.36in long and 5cm/1.97in wide. The springs at the closure of the hot curler clips are strong and durable, can maintain high elasticity even after repeated use. The roller clips can hold most hair rollers and heated curlers up to 60mm , meet your different curling needs.
